presentation.name: Victor Heijler
presentation.title: Consultant
presentation.summary:
I'm originally from the Stockholm area and have been interested in Web technologies for a long time. I'm currently honing my knowledge och Web Technologies and learning Java at Experis Academy.

I play video games, look for GeoCaches and tinker with technology in my sparetime.

education.summary: Studying the Interactive Media and Web Technologies program at Linnaeus University, which included intensive studies in modern Web Technologies, interaction design and theory.

work-experience.title: Consultant
work-experience.summary: Full Stack Developer, working with front- and back-end technologies. Primarily Java, Java Spring, and JavaScript with React, Vue and Angular.

work-experience.title: Teaching assistant
work-experience.summary: Teaching assistant in the courses Web Technology 1 and Web Technology 2. With focus on teaching in a lab setting and grading web technologies.

work-experience.title: Intern
work-experience.summary: Web development with React, Redux and MongoDB. Development of a prototype for a project in health care.

extra.title: Crossboard
extra.summary: Created prototyping tool for rapid exploration/visualization of datasets as part of a research project at Linnaeus University. Using D3, DC.js, CSS & HTML, and React.

extra.title: ECraft2Learn
extra.summary: Created authoring tools (Sharing of files, commenting, task list) for students and teachers to use within the making-oriented project eCraft2Learn. Using JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, CSS & HTML.
